name: bc40e461-5283-5ca3-a22b-271dcfb19dc1
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at El Arenosillo, Spain (20060101 - 20080505). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at El Arenosillo, Spain (20060101 - 20080505)
